title: Intensive Course on Enhancing Elementary Mathematics Foundational Skills Using Mental Math Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations (addition/subtraction) and number system fundamentals
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen elementary mathematics instructional competencies for professionals, applying mobile-based microlearning in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Perform addition/subtraction within 20 with 90% accuracy using skip-counting and bridging-through-ten strategies
Visually and conceptually explain numerical relationships within the range (0-100) through number structuring
Enhance decision-making skills to selectively apply mental math strategies in everyday problem situations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
